version_description:
Updated content for Destiny 2's 2.0.0.2 update
• Preventing the 3D view for items that aren't rendering properly.
• Gambit Post Game Carnage Reports now show correct stats
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for Cross Save!
• Added support for Cross Save in Clans and Fireteams.
• Added a link to the Cross Save page in the More menu.
• Added a prompt for PC players to link a Steam account.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Revelry event!
• Added the 'last online' status to players in the Clan roster.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Aktualisiert für die „Fluch des Osiris“-Erweiterung
• Spieler können jetzt über ihre Profilseite ihre Spielegeschichte ansehen und teilen
• In der Ausrüstungsansicht ist es jetzt möglich, Gegenstände von der Poststelle anzunehmen

• Improved 3D Gear view. Armor pieces will be shown with a complete character.
• Improved item transfer logic. If an item fails to transfer from one character to another, it will automatically be returned to the original character.
• Some forums now require a linked Destiny account to participate.
• Fix for a crash in clan profiles on devices running iOS 9.
• Improved support for the iPhone X.

• Added Destiny currencies to the Gear section
• Improved 3D Gear view. Armor pieces will be shown with a complete character.
• Improved item transfer logic. If an item fails to transfer from one character to another, it will automatically be returned to the original character.
• Some forums now require a linked Destiny account to participate.
• Fix for a crash in clan profiles on devices running iOS 9.
• Improved support for the iPhone X.

• Spieler können jetzt andere Spieler über die Nachspielstatistik melden, wenn sie Teil des Spiels waren
• Support für Kill-Tracker bei Meisterwerk-Waffendetails hinzugefügt
• Verbesserte Hilfesuche

Viele Bug-Fixes, inklusive:
• Fix für falsche Ausrüstungs-Powersortierung, wenn Gegenstände enthalten waren, die keine Power besitzen

Viele Bug-Fixes, inklusive:
Fix eines möglichen Absturzes beim Öffnen der App
Fix eines Problems, durch das Nachrichten beim Start einer Konversation doppelt angezeigt wurden

Viele Bug-Fixes, inklusive:
• Fix für falsche Ausrüstungs-Powersortierung, wenn Gegenstände enthalten waren, die keine Power besitzen

• Support, um Prämien im „Gruppenkämpfe“-Live Event zu sehen, wurde hinzugefügt
• Fix dafür, dass Gegenstands-Stat-Namen auf iOS 11 seltsam angezeigt wurden

• Support, um Prämien im „Gruppenkämpfe“-Live Event zu sehen, wurde hinzugefügt
• Fix dafür, dass Gegenstands-Stat-Namen auf iOS 11 seltsam angezeigt wurden
• Das Übertragen von Verbrauchsgegenständen, Modifikationen und Shadern in den und aus dem Tresor ist jetzt möglich

• Option hinzugefügt, durch die Clans per Name gesucht werden können (nur exakte Übereinstimmung)
• Fix für einige Meilensteine, deren Name und Symbol nicht angezeigt wurden

• Added the ability to share screenshots of 3D renders for characters and items.
• Added an option to enable/disable Push System Announcements.

• Gruppen und Sammlungen wurden dem Fortschritts-Tab hinzugefügt
• Empfohlene Clans wurden dem „Clans browsen“-Bildschirm hinzugefügt
• Verbesserte Hilfesuche

• Aktualisiert für die „Fluch des Osiris“-Erweiterung
• Spieler können jetzt über ihre Profilseite ihre Spielegeschichte ansehen und teilen
• In der Ausrüstungsansicht ist es jetzt möglich, Gegenstände von der Poststelle anzunehmen

• Spieler können jetzt andere Spieler über die Nachspielstatistik melden, wenn sie Teil des Spiels waren
• Support für Kill-Tracker bei Meisterwerk-Waffendetails hinzugefügt

• Improved 3D Gear view. Armor pieces will be shown with a complete character.
• Improved item transfer logic. If an item fails to transfer from one character to another, it will automatically be returned to the original character.
• Some forums now require a linked Destiny account to participate.
• Fix for a crash in clan profiles on devices running iOS 9.
• Improved support for the iPhone X.

• Added Destiny currencies to the Gear section
• Improved 3D Gear view. Armor pieces will be shown with a complete character.
• Improved item transfer logic. If an item fails to transfer from one character to another, it will automatically be returned to the original character.
• Some forums now require a linked Destiny account to participate.
• Fix for a crash in clan profiles on devices running iOS 9.
• Improved support for the iPhone X.

• Added the ability to apply perks, mods, and shaders to weapons and armor (requires notifications to be enabled).
• Added scores to Nightfall Strikes in game history.

• Added vendor inventories to the Progress section.
• Added the ability to apply perks, mods, and shaders to weapons and armor (requires notifications to be enabled).
• Added scores to Nightfall Strikes in game history.

• Added 3D characters to the Gear section (requires device support for OpenGL ES 3.0).
• Updated the Clans section with support for the new Fireteams (Beta).
• Added the Account section to the tab bar.

• Added 3D characters to the Gear section (requires device support for OpenGL ES 3.0).
• Updated the Clans section with support for the new Fireteams (Beta).
• Added the Account section to the tab bar.
• Fixed Forum topic sort options missing from Forum categories.
• Fixed Gear search missing from the Gear section.
• Fixed a crash in Vendors on devices running iOS 9.

• Added 3D characters to the Gear section (requires device support for OpenGL ES 3.0).
• Updated the Clans section with support for the new Fireteams (Beta).
• Fixed Destiny characters missing from Account profiles.
• Fixed Forum topic sort options missing from Forum categories.
• Fixed Gear search missing from the Gear section.
• Fixed a crash in Vendors on devices running iOS 9.

• Added the ability to share screenshots of 3D renders for characters and items.
• Added an option to enable/disable Push System Announcements.

• Added Application History to user settings.
• Bug fixes.

• Added Crucible Valor/Glory ranks to player profiles.
• Added support for showing Seasonal Ranks in Vendors.
• Added game type and teams to private matches in Game History.
• Added support for showing the contents of the Prismatic Matrix in Eververse.
• Added support for showing the new Multi-Emotes.
• Added support for Pursuits in the Gear section.
• Fixed the Masterwork state not showing on Legendary and Exotic items.
• Find Fireteams improvements.
• Clans are no longer required to create a fireteam.
• All users can now create a scheduled fireteam.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Added a character selection page to the Gear section.
• Fireteams can now be flagged with a language upon creation.
• Added language filters to fireteam searches, allowing for easier matching with other players who speak the same language.
• PC fireteams will now show the full BattleTag to fireteam members.
• Added support for the Moments of Triumph T-Shirt reward (available 7/31).
• All users will be signed out, including 3rd party app users. Users will be required to accept the latest version of the privacy policy at sign in.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes, performance improvements, and added language support for Korean.

Updated for Destiny 2 Forsaken
•Added the new Triumphs and Collections to the Companion section
•Added new Vendors
•Updated Milestones to include the new Challenges.
•Added Bungie Rewards
•Added Silver balance and Eververse purchase history
•Bug fixes and performance improvements

Updated content for Destiny 2's 2.0.0.2 update
• Preventing the 3D view for items that aren't rendering properly.
• Gambit Post Game Carnage Reports now show correct stats
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated content for the Destiny 2 Hotfix 2.0.3
• Selecting an item in the Gear section now opens the item details, and a long-press shows the item actions.
• Fixed the swipe-to-go-back gesture in the Forums.

• Added the ability to pull items from other characters and the Vault onto the current character.
• Added the 'Retrieve from Postmaster' action to gear item details.
• Fixed the actions in gear item details not being selectable on the name of the action.
• Fixed long Clan chat messages sometimes getting cut off at the end.

• Postmaster items can now be found in the Gear General tab.
• Added Postmaster items to the Pull action list in the Gear section.
• Added the ability to lock and unlock items in the Gear section.
• Fixed a crash when accessing Forum actions while using the app in Korean.
• Fixed the keyboard not being available for Bungie.net group messages.

Updated for Cross Save!
• Added support for Cross Save in Clans and Fireteams.
• Added a link to the Cross Save page in the More menu.
• Added a prompt for PC players to link a Steam account.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of Opulence!
• Added The Menagerie activity to Fireteams and Game History.
• Improved the reliability of Xbox Fireteam invites.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Updated the sign in flow to address issues related to using a Google account for Battle.net authentication.
• The app should now correctly show your last played Destiny account after signing in.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Fixed Black Armory Forge activities not showing the correct name and background.
• Fixed inconsistent Vendor inventory category order.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for The Dawning event.
• Added the Forge activity to Fireteams.
• Updated the Crucible Valor and Glory ranks for Season 5.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Added a prompt for users to accept our Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Code of Conduct.
• Fixed a possible crash when retrieving lost items from the Postmaster.
• Added email validation status to the Profile settings.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Added Escalation Protocol and Blind Well activities to the Fireteams section.
• Added a link to the new Refer-A-Friend promotion for Destiny 2: Forsaken.
• Moved equip, transfer, and lock actions into a bar on the Gear item details screen.
• Fixed item actions sometimes being unavailable in the Gear section.

• Fixed a crash in Gear item details on iOS 9.
• Fixed 3D renders for certain weapons and ships in the Gear section (for example, the Trinity Ghoul exotic bow).
• Fixed missing pieces in 3D renders for certain Gear items (for example, The Chaperone exotic shotgun).

• Fixed a crash in Gear item details on iOS 9.
• Fixed 3D renders for certain weapons and ships in the Gear section (for example, the Trinity Ghoul exotic bow).
• Fixed missing pieces in 3D renders for certain Gear items (for example, The Chaperone exotic shotgun).

Updated for Destiny 2: Forsaken 2.1.0
• Fixed 3D models for certain weapons and ships in the Gear section.
• Fixed missing triangles in the 3D models of some items with cloth pieces (Warlock robes, Hunter cloaks, Titan marks).
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for The Dawning event.
• Added the Forge activity to Fireteams.
• Updated the Crucible Valor and Glory ranks for Season 5.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Added a prompt for users to accept our Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Code of Conduct.
• Fixed a possible crash when retrieving lost items from the Postmaster.
• Added email validation status to the Profile settings.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of the Drifter!
• Added game history support for Gambit Prime, Gambit Private Matches, and Reckoning activities.
• Added the Reckoning activity to Fireteams.
• Added the ability to report Fireteams.
• Added a prompt for players to verify their email address.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Updated the sign in flow to address issues related to using a Google account for Battle.net authentication.
• The app should now correctly show your last played Destiny account after signing in.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Moved the Fireteam 'Report' action, and added the ability to 'Share' Fireteam links.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Revelry event!
• Added the 'last online' status to players in the Clan roster.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Fixed unintentionally dark 3D renders in the Gear section.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Fixed Black Armory Forge activities not showing the correct name and background.
• Fixed inconsistent Vendor inventory category order.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of Opulence!
• Added The Menagerie activity to Fireteams and Game History.
• Improved the reliability of Xbox Fireteam invites.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for Cross Save!
• Added support for Cross Save in Clans and Fireteams.
• Added a link to the Cross Save page in the More menu.
• Added a prompt for PC players to link a Steam account.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for Shadowkeep and Season of the Undying!
• Added support for the Steam platform in Fireteams.
• Added the Vex Offensive and Nightmare Hunt activities to Fireteams.
• Added support for Seasons and the Seasonal Artifact.
• Added support for Armor 2.0 stats and mods.
• Showing the new Champion 'Breaker' damage types on weapons.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for Shadowkeep and Season of the Undying!
• Added support for the Steam platform in Fireteams.
• Added the Vex Offensive and Nightmare Hunt activities to Fireteams.
• Added support for Seasons and the Seasonal Artifact.
• Added support for Armor 2.0 stats and mods.
• Showing the new Champion 'Breaker' damage types on weapons.
• Fixed crashes when using the app in Japanese and Polish.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for Shadowkeep and Season of the Undying!
• Added support for the Steam platform in Fireteams.
• Added the Vex Offensive and Nightmare Hunt activities to Fireteams.
• Added support for Seasons and the Seasonal Artifact.
• Added support for Armor 2.0 stats and mods.
• Showing the new Champion 'Breaker' damage types on weapons.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for Festival of the Lost and the 2.6.1 game release!
• Find Fireteams for the new Altars of Sorrow event and Pit of Heresy dungeon.
• Copy the Steam ID for players in Fireteams to /invite or /join in-game.
• Now showing the applied ornament icon and screenshot for Gear items.
• Added back the available perks and mods on Gear items, when available.
• New Bungie Rewards are now available for Shadowkeep and Festival of the Lost.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for Festival of the Lost and the 2.6.1 game release!
• Find Fireteams for the new Altars of Sorrow event and Pit of Heresy dungeon.
• Copy the Steam ID for players in Fireteams to /invite or /join in-game.
• Now showing the applied ornament icon and screenshot for Gear items.
• Added back the available perks and mods on Gear items, when available.
• New Bungie Rewards are now available for Shadowkeep and Festival of the Lost.
• Added support for Stadia Fireteams when they become available later this month.
• Added a link to the Bungie Store in the More menu.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Find Fireteams for the new Altars of Sorrow event and Pit of Heresy dungeon.
• Copy the Steam ID for players in Fireteams to /invite or /join in-game.
• Now showing the applied ornament icon and screenshot for Gear items.
• Added support for Stadia Fireteams.
• Added a link to the Bungie Store in the More menu.
• Fixed an issue with expired sessions not getting signed out automatically.

• Find Fireteams for the new Altars of Sorrow event and Pit of Heresy dungeon.
• Copy the Steam ID for players in Fireteams to /invite or /join in-game.
• Added proper support for Stadia Fireteams.
• Added a link to the Bungie Store in the More menu.
• Fixed an issue with expired sessions not getting signed out automatically.

Updated for the Season of Dawn!
• Find a Fireteam for the new Sundial seasonal arena.
• Track your progress towards upgrading the Obelisks in Vendors.
• Claim your rewards earned in the previous season, so you don't lose them!
• New Bungie Rewards are now available for the Season of Dawn.
• Fixed vendor inventories sometimes getting cut off on iPad.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of Dawn!
• Claim your rewards earned in the previous season, so you don't lose them!
• Fixed some season reward claim errors for non-Steam accounts.
• Find a Fireteam for the new Sundial seasonal arena.
• Track your progress towards upgrading the Obelisks in Vendors.
• New Bungie Rewards are now available for the Season of Dawn.
• Fixed vendor inventories sometimes getting cut off on iPad.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of Dawn!
• Claim your rewards earned in the previous season, so you don't lose them!
• Fixed some season reward claim errors for non-Steam accounts.
• Find a Fireteam for the new Sundial seasonal arena.
• Track your progress towards upgrading the Obelisks in Vendors.
• New Bungie Rewards are now available for the Season of Dawn.
• Fixed vendor inventories sometimes getting cut off on iPad.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Added Bounties and Quests to a new Pursuits page with Milestones.
• Now showing completion and expiration status on bounties.
• Fixed pinned topics in the forums appearing deemphasized if they're also locked.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of the Worthy, and Trials of Osiris!
• Find players in Fireteams for Trials of Osiris, Seraph Bunkers, and Seraph Towers.
• Check out the new Stat Trackers under Triumphs and on character nameplates.
• See the bounties and rewards that Rasputin has to offer in Vendors.
• Earn Bungie Rewards with your victories in Trials of Osiris, and more throughout the season.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of the Worthy, and Trials of Osiris!
• Find players in Fireteams for Trials of Osiris, Seraph Bunkers, and Seraph Towers.
• Check out the new Stat Trackers under Triumphs and on character nameplates.
• See the bounties and rewards that Rasputin has to offer in Vendors.
• Earn Bungie Rewards with your victories in Trials of Osiris, and more throughout the season.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of the Worthy, and Trials of Osiris!
• Find players in Fireteams for Trials of Osiris, Seraph Bunkers, and Seraph Towers.
• Check out the new Stat Trackers under Triumphs and on character nameplates.
• See the bounties and rewards that Rasputin has to offer in Vendors.
• Earn Bungie Rewards with your victories in Trials of Osiris, and more throughout the season.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of the Worthy, and Trials of Osiris!
• Find players in Fireteams for Trials of Osiris, Seraph Bunkers, and Seraph Towers.
• Check out the new Stat Trackers under Triumphs and on character nameplates.
• See the bounties and rewards that Rasputin has to offer in Vendors.
• Earn Bungie Rewards with your victories in Trials of Osiris, and more throughout the season.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Renamed the 'Companion' section to 'Director' with a new layout, and added the Clan Roster.
• Renamed the 'Gear' section to 'Guardian' and added Triumphs, Collections, Stat Trackers, and Game History.
• Added a new button to jump directly to your Lost Items at the Postmaster.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of Arrivals!
• Find a Fireteam for the new 'Contact' public event.
• Earn Pinnacle rewards in the new Prophecy dungeon.
• Track your upgrades at the new Prismatic Recaster seasonal vendor.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of the Worthy.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of Arrivals!
• Find a Fireteam for the new 'Contact' public event and Prophecy dungeon.
• Track your upgrades at the new Prismatic Recaster seasonal vendor.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of the Worthy.
• Added the Destiny account currencies to the Guardian section.
• Fixed a crash in the Season section when using the app in Japanese or Polish.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of Arrivals!
• Find a Fireteam for the new 'Contact' public event and Prophecy dungeon.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of the Worthy.
• Added the Destiny account currencies to the Guardian section.
• Added the power limit to item details for weapons and armor.
• Added platform account names to player profiles.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of Arrivals!
• Find a Fireteam for the new 'Contact' public event and Prophecy dungeon.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of the Worthy.
• Added the Destiny account currencies to the Guardian section.
• Added the power limit to item details for weapons and armor.
• Added platform account names to player profiles.
• Fixed a crash at launch on iOS 9.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for the Season of Arrivals!
• Find a Fireteam for the new 'Contact' public event and Prophecy dungeon.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of the Worthy.
• Added the Destiny account currencies to the Guardian section.
• Added the power limit to item details for weapons and armor.
• Added platform account names to player profiles.
• Fixed player reporting in Game History matches.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for Beyond Light and the Season of the Hunt!
• Track your accomplishments with Active and Legacy Triumphs.
• Medals, Exotic Catalysts, and Lore now have their own categories in the Guardian section.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of Arrivals.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Updated for Beyond Light and the Season of the Hunt!
• Added new Fireteam categories for Europa and Season 12.
• Track your accomplishments with Active and Legacy Triumphs.
• Medals, Exotic Catalysts, and Lore now have their own categories in the Guardian section.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of Arrivals.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

New feature - Pick up Bounties with the app!
• Save time by acquiring bounties ahead of any activity, while you’re offline, in orbit, or in the Tower.
• This requires access to push notifications to verify the source of the actions.
• Updated the icons and backgrounds for the new activities in Fireteams.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

New feature - Pick up Bounties with the app!
• Save time by acquiring bounties ahead of any activity, while you’re offline, in orbit, or in the Tower.
• This requires access to push notifications to verify the source of the actions.
• Fixed a crash in Bounties when using the app in Italian.
• Now showing Stasis subclasses in Fireteams.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

New feature - Pick up Bounties with the app!
• Added a new category for Empire Hunts in Fireteams.
• Fixed a crash in Bounties when using the app in Italian.
• Now showing Stasis subclasses in Fireteams.

New feature - Pick up Bounties with the app!
• Fixed expired sessions not getting signed out properly.
• Added a new category for Empire Hunts in Fireteams.
• Fixed a crash in Bounties when using the app in Italian.
• Now showing Stasis subclasses in Fireteams.

Updated for the Season of the Chosen!
• Track your progress on the new Seasonal Challenges in the Director section.
• Added new Fireteams categories for Battlegrounds and Exotic Quests.
• Powerful reward Challenges are still available in Pursuits.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of the Hunt.

Updated for the Season of the Chosen!
• Added new Fireteams categories for Battlegrounds and Exotic Quests.
• Track your progress on the new Seasonal Challenges in the Director section.
• Powerful reward Challenges are still available in the Pursuits section.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of the Hunt.
• Added an action to copy player IDs in Fireteams.

• Updated the Vendors section to show more of them in the list at once.
• Improved scrolling performance in the Vendors section.
• Added new Fireteams categories for Battlegrounds and Exotic Quests.
• Track your progress on the new Seasonal Challenges in the Director section.
• Powerful reward Challenges are still available in the Pursuits section.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of the Hunt.
• Added an action to copy player IDs in Fireteams.

• Added an explanation for why Fireteam invites are temporarily disabled on PlayStation.
• Added an app update prompt for future releases.
• Fixed the feedback button in the Fireteams help section.

• Categorized the Vault items into different gear slots, so that they're easier to browse.
• Added objective progress to Vendor item details, like the locked Umbral Engrams at the Prismatic Recaster.
• Fixed actions (lock/unlock, apply perk/shader/mod) not working on items in the Vault.
• Fixed the Power value on Engrams at Vendors and in your Inventory.
• Fixed the possible missing objective progress in the Pursuits section.

Updated for the Season of the Splicer!
• Find Fireteams for new seasonal activities and the return of the Vault of Glass.
• Acquire new Bounties from Ada-1 and the Splicer Servitor.
• Track your progress towards the rewards in the new Seasonal Challenges.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of the Chosen.
• Note: Shaders are now unlocked and are no longer in your Inventory.

Updated for the Season of the Splicer!
• Find Fireteams for new seasonal activities and the return of the Vault of Glass.
• Acquire new Bounties from Ada-1 and the Splicer Servitor.
• Track your progress towards the rewards in the new Seasonal Challenges.
• Pick up your unclaimed rewards from the Season of the Chosen.
• Updated the icons and backgrounds for new Season 14 activities in Fireteams.
• Now opening the new help.bungie.net site for player support content.
